name: Clock Head
description:
Created for Moshboy's birthday jam albeit after the fact , Clock Head is a speedrunning platformer with a global leaderboard.

I'm not sure whether to consider this an alpha build of a much larger game or a completed micro game. Either way thanks for checking out my shit and I would really appreciate any feedback!

Speak to me on the twitters

Watch me play games on the YouTubes

Clock Head uses a Tileset by the talented surt that was downloaded from OpenGameArt.

Secret music track by the legendary Dragline
